reviews.review: A classic that stills holds up amazingly today, the story and lore are rich, the game play is even better, and the humor is top notch. Portal has held its crown as one of the best games ever made for so long and I think it's going to stay that way. Highly recommend every gamer has to play this at least once in their life time.
Buen clasico, no necesitas y cuesta poco, si quieres rejugabilidad vete a la segunda entrega
broken game the voice kept on breaking up and glitching and going static
this game is a classic, and has aged beautifully. Definitely get this game, and play portal 2 afterwards. it might be challenging at some points, but thats what makes it fun

This was a triumph.
I'm making a note here: HUGE SUCCESS.
It's hard to overstate my satisfaction.
Aperture Science
We do what we must
Because we can.
For the good of all of us.
Except the ones who are dead.
But there's no sense crying over every mistake.
You just keep on trying till you run out of cake.
And the Science gets done.
And you make a neat gun.
For the people who are still alive.
I'm not even angry.
I'm being so sincere right now.
Even though you broke my heart.
And killed me.
And tore me to pieces.
And threw every piece into a fire.
As they burned it hurt because I was so happy for you!
Now these points of data make a beautiful line.
And we're out of beta.
We're releasing on time.
So I'm GLaD. I got burned.
Think of all the things we learned
For the people who are still alive.
Go ahead and leave me.
I think I prefer to stay inside.
Maybe you'll find someone else to help you.
Maybe Black Mesa
THAT WAS A JOKE.
HAHA. FAT CHANCE.
Anyway, this cake is great.
It's so delicious and moist.
Look at me still talking
When there's Science to do.
When I look out there, it makes me GLaD I'm not you.
I've experiments to run.
There is research to be done.
On the people who are still alive.
And believe me I am still alive.
I'm doing Science and I'm still alive.
I feel FANTASTIC and I'm still alive.
While you're dying I'll be still alive.
And when you're dead I will be still alive.
STILL ALIVE
Still alive.
it is great expecialy when you kill the cake core spoiler
amazing puzzle adventure game. if you got big brain this is the game for you :)

Not as good as the sequel, but still worth the regular $9.99 price. A good sci-fi puzzle game with a fasinacting concept that spawned one of Valve’s best franchises. The storyline is pretty solid and rewarding for those who like to pay attention to details, but keep in mind it is short and can be finished in around 2 hours if you’re new. Because of this, you could just wait until a sale when this game is at $0.99 or $1.99.

Aperture Science. We do what we must because we can. For the good of all of us (except the ones who are dead).

Buglara hiç denk gelmedim.
Alın yani.

The tightest, most well packaged 2 hours of gaming I've ever played.
It's ingenious gameplay mechanics, excellently crafted environments, and hilariously dark humour combine into the perfect package.
It's considered by many to be the greatest game of all time, and there are few games that could put up a worthy challenge to that title.

Awesome classic puzzler.  The game goes fast - easily beatable in a day - but it's a good ride.  It's also on sale like every Steam Sale, so pick it up on the cheap where you can.
This game redefined a genre and is a masterpiece.  Every gamer should play this through at least once.

攻略サイトとか見ないで、自力でエンディングまでクリアーしましたが、
序盤の途中で、しばらくプレイしてなかったので、操作方法を忘れてしまって、
Eボタンでボックス取れる操作を忘れてプレイしてました・・・
おかげで、ただでさえ難しいゲームの難易度がさらに跳ね上がることに。。。

ハートのボックスが出るところで、進行不可能になり、Eボタンが使えることを思い出し、
それから、やっと最後までクリアーできました。

このゲームはやりごたえがありますね。

Мне понравился играть портал на первой части! Был очень интересно и смотрел прочитать субтитры, говорящие у неизвестного администратора. Уникальный вход на сквозь двух дверей, это хотя, бы рекомендовал эту игру 
Ладно, забыл поставить давно положительный обзор. 
Удачи, Гейб!

The original portal, now a bit older (13 years old at time of writing), is still a nice puzzle game. The engine and graphics have not suffered by the passage of time, the game still looks quite well and the puzzles are set-up well. They can be challenging and sometimes there are creative solutions for you to try. But in all cases, you can solve the puzzles by carefully looking at your environment, taking your time and thinking it through. All the while enjoying the musings of a... well. Let's say "interesting"AI.

The only downside is, once you've solved the puzzle, there is little replay value. Combined with a rather short main game, portal offers limited value for your money. 

With that being said, for these sort of games, I always like comparing it to a movie ticket for a night out. For where I live, portal is about 75% the price of a movie ticket, less when on offer. A movie offers me 2-3 hours viewing pleasure. I estimate my first play through had me puzzling for about 4 hours. So on that scale, portal is certainly worth the money.

Portal remains a great game, even in 2020. But as it is not the longest, nor the most recent game, I would recommend buying it while it is on discount. And if you can get it together with portal 2, all the better. After you've learned to think with portals in the original, you can take it to the next level in portal 2.
